title: Revolutionizing electrochemical CO2 reduction to deeply reduced products on non-Cu-based electrocatalysts
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01301H, Review Article
Haoming Yu, Hsiwen Wu, Yuen Leong Chow, Jun Wang, Jie Zhang
Producing deeply reduced (>2 eâˆ’ per carbon atom) products from the electrochemical CO2 reduction reaction on non-Cu-based catalysts is an attractive and sustainable approach for CO2 utilization.
